Very comfortable and well made. Washed very well.
Love it!
Love this sweater. Perfect for me. Looks great with anything that I wear. Get one for yourself and you will see,

My sweater arrived right on time.  I ordered a medium and the fit was as expected. I am tall with long armsso I loved the sleeve length.  Also, I loved the feel of the fabric- it has a nice quality feel to it.  It is definitely casual with a little stepped up feel to it.  Great to through on with a cute pair of dark denim jeans.  It looks very much like the pictures.  :-) no surprises here :-)
I love the style, color and the fit.  However, this top is more of a sweatshirt than sweater.

I do love the sweater; but it's not truly oversized!  I'm 5'7" & appx. 125 pounds with long arms.  I got my regular size which is a medium and it fits like a true medium - not oversized at all.  So if that's what you're looking for size up one size.  It's really warm and cozy and seems nice quality.  I just took off one star due to the sizing description.

Great quality so comfortable absolutely love it

This was really cute and perfectly oversized for comfort and coverage over leggings. Until you wash it. This was washed in cold water on a gentle cycle and laid flat to dry (not put in the dryer), so no heat applied, and the sleeves are now too short and the length of the shirt no longer covers my backside.  So, after only 1 wear, it’s now on the “old shirt - only wear around the house” pile. Really disappointing because I was planning to order more colors.
So beautiful!! Looks amazing! Fits perfect! Washed great!
This was surprisingly soft and comfy. Feels like an athletic style sweatshirt but looks like a classier sweater. True to size fit.
Great fit and the high quality of the fabric. Heavier weight to it but very comfortable. Cute & stylish. Highly recommend.

Love this sweater -fashionable and warm!

I got the beige with the cream colored collar And wrists. And I have since ordered the black. One of my favorite sweaters for sure.

I absolutely love this sweater. Buy when I washed it, the top part discolored. There is a blue color on it. I use tide and downy free and I've never had that happen to any other clothes. This sweater is better than expected, looks great, feels soft and is great quality. This was a great purchase
I absolutely love this sweater! It’s true to size and so comfortable!! Definitely recommend you to purchase this!!

评论概述: Fits big at first but shrinks after washing!
评论详情: When I first tried this sweater on it was a lot bigger than I was expecting but after checking the material I figured it would shrink in the wash/dryer so I kept it. I’m 5’6 and 155lbs and ordered a large.  After washing and drying, it definitely fit smaller and more like I was expecting so I’m glad I kept the large.  The colour and feel of this sweater is divine. It’s heavy and expensive feeling. It’s soooo soft. The quality is truly impressive for the price!  I washed it immediately before wearing and the sweater came out in perfect condition, just a smaller (and better) fit!  I will say the only thing I wish was that it was slightly less boxy looking and had a bit more shape but overall I’m very impressed! It’s a cozy but luxe sweater!
I did return this, however, it is really nice material. Feels expensive. I only returned it because it fit my arms and chest well but not my tummy :(

I don’t know if it was the color I ordered or if it was the sweater, something just wasn’t right! The material was buttery soft and I really thought about it but something was just very off. Did end up returning
I washed the sweater for the first time and, when removed from wash, it has pills on fabric. I noticed some pilling before even washing.
It’s now one of my favorite shirts:)
Good value.
I got an XL for a baggy look and it's absolutely perfect! I love the vibrant colors and it looks great with leggings
Perfect sizing. Amazing color and quality!  LOVE IT!
I absolutely am in love with my new sweater! Don't worry about the size guide when ordering, just order the size you normally wear! I will be ordering more sweaters in different colors like this one!

If you're on the fence, don't be. I love the fit, the softness, the quality and the color! I especially love the sleeves. This is the ideal sweater to give that "old money" look without the insane price tag!
Nice sweater; however,not really oversized. I am 5’ 7, 146 lbs and ordered my regular size M. The sweater fits like any other M. I do like it and will wear it with wide leg jeans.

When deciding on purchasing Amazon recommendation was to order a Medium, which I did. It was waaaay too baggy and long on me. IMO I looked heavier than I am LOL! It was cute enough that I returned and got the small. It worked. I feel the Khaki-ish  color looks more yellow beige. Not good for my color of blond. Gave it to my dark haired daughter and she loves it.
This was a great fit for me in petite length. Washes well and very comfy.
I have gotten lots of compliments on this. Looks and feels expensive but isn’t. Can’t ask for anything else!
Probably my favorite shirt i have bought online! Great quality, great fit! Fast shipping!
very attractive sweater - perfect fit

I don't normally write reviews but this sweater surprised me on the quality. It's really well made and looks expensive.  It's long enough to wear with leggings or cute with jeans.  I'm 5'3" 119 lbs and a small fit perfectly.
Love this sweater. Great quality. Accurate color and size. Would definitely buy again.
Very comfortable and very soft it’s the cutest sweater

I love how soft this sweater is and I absolutely love the color! The material is stretchy and cozy! Very good quality!!!
Sweater was super cute and soft!
